content: Praarambham
(palllliyil praveshichu kurishu varachu kondu thaazhepparayunna praarththhanayum oru kaumaayum cholliyashesham namaskaaratthil sambandhikkunna)
Bahumathipoorvvam ninte bhavanatthilekku nyaan vannu ente nerchakall ninakku kazhikkum.
Oru kaumaa

items.content: (shushrooshakkaaran madbahaayil praveshikkumpoll)
Daivatthinte balipeedhatthingkalekkum ente paithal prakrthatthe santoshippikkunna daivatthinte adukkalekku nyaan pokum.
(thronosinte mumpil chennu vanangikkond)
Daivame ninre bhavanatthilekku nyaan praveshichu - svargasthhanaaya raajaave ninre simhaasanatthinu munpaake nyaan panangi nyaan cheythittulllla sakala paapangallum ennodu kshamikkaname.
(thronosu chutti mutthumpoll‍)

Kar‍tthaave, ninte balipeedhatthinte konukall‍ vare changalakallaal  nyangallude perunaallukalle bandhikkaname - nee ente daivamaakunnu; ninakku nyaan‍ sthothram cheyyum - nee ente daivamaakunnu; ninne nyaan‍ sthuthikkum.
(mezhukuthiri katthikkumpoll‍. Vadakku vashatthe mezhukuthiri)
Vellivuniranyorisho...
(thekku vashatthe mezhukuthiri)
Vellivin‍thattil‍...
(shushrooshakkuppaayam dharikkumpoll‍)
Daivamaaya kar‍tthaave, vishuddha roohaayude shakthiyaal‍ naashamillaattha

Angki enne dharippikkaname - pithaavum, puthranum, vishuddha ruhaayume!- nyangallude aayushkaalam muzhuvanum - sathyavishvaasatthil‍ vedippum chovvumulllla nadapadikallil‍ nadatthappeduvaan‍ - nyangall‍kku samgathiyaakkaname. Aammeen‍.
(ooraaraa dharikkumpoll‍)
Yuddhatthil‍ shakthikondu enne ara kettikkukayum - enikku virodhamaayi nil‍kkunnavare - ente keezhil‍ muttu madakkikkukayum cheyyumaaraakaname. Aammeen‍.
(pattakkaaran‍ kur‍bbaanaykkaayi madbahaayude nadayil‍ kayari padinyaarottu thirinyu kaimalar‍tthippidichu “shubkkono” chodikkumpoll‍)
Janam:- kar‍tthaavu angayude praar‍ththhana kellkkukayum - baliyil‍ thirumanassaakukayum - kur‍bbaana sveekarikkukayum - angayodukoode nyangalleyum sambandhippikkukayum cheyyumaaraakatte.

content: (koor‍bbaanaykku mumpu pazhayaniyamam vaayikkuvaan‍ thudangumpoll‍)
“neethimaanmaarude koodaaratthil‍ - mahathvatthinteyum rakshayudeyum shabdam” ennu daaveedu mukhaantiram parishuddha roohaa - paadi.
(madbahaayude thaazhe namaskkaarameshayude vadakke attam cher‍nnu ninnukond)
Vaayanakkaaran‍:- oraitthaayude onnaam pusthakatthil ninnum - baarekmor‍.
Janam:- srshdikallude udayavanu sthuthiyum - nammude mel thante anugrahangallum - ennekkumundaayirikkatte.
(kur‍baanaykkaayi thirashsheela neekkunnathinu mump)
(bnuharoku hosenaan‍ enna mattil)

Kar‍tthaave! Praar‍ththhana kettarull‍ - haaleluyyaa
1. Kaikkollllanamaharonanachathupole - dhuൂpamithum
Kandadiyaar‍ shushrooshaye ninuvayarin‍ - yaachana pol
/tkadalathil‍ yaunaane - nnapo - le
/tkaniyuka daasanmaa - rilennum.

Kar‍tthaave nilavilli kettarull‍ - haale - luyyaa
2. Theeruka thirunaamatthinu sukhakaramaa - yeedhupam
Thrkkarallinnalivinnanukoolamathaam-moolavumaay
/tnirappaakaname dai-vame-nin
/tnirupamakrpayaal‍ nya-ngallo-d.

3. Ennum sthuthinin‍kanivinu kaniverum-rakshakane
Ethra niranyinnengum kaanunnoo - nin‍daanam
/tninuvayarodundaa -yako-pam
/tnilavilliyaal‍ nee nee - kkiya - llo.

4. Aharonteyumaa skkariyaa thannudeyum-dhoopamathum
Maranatthe neekkiya phinahaasin‍ praar‍ - ththhanayum pol
/tadiyaarude dhoopa -tthe-yum
/tan‍pudayone kai -kko - llka.

5. Erithee nira vitteere doothanira-ngichenn
Ithamodu mariyaam grhamathil‍ nasretthil cholliyith
/tninnodukoode ka-rtthaa-vee
/tmannidamakhilam paalippon‍.”

6. Mull‍marameriyaatheritheethan‍ naduvil‍ - kandathupol
Chinmayanammariyaammil‍vasichu sharee-ram poondu
/tathinaal‍ bhamgavuma-kka-nyaa
/tvrathamudraykkundaa-yi-lla.

7. Lokam thaathasahodarar‍ jaathiyathum-tharavaadum
Aakeyupekshicheshuvinaayu maranam-snehicha
/tsahadenmaare sadaa-kaa-lam
/tsmaranam cheyvathu - nannettam.

8. Thookkappettumaratthil‍ vilaavuthura-nnaachavallam
Raktham vellllamodozhukum mashihaaye - sahadenmaar,
/tkandangodi mari-ppaa-naay
/tkar‍tthaavin‍ per‍-kkellaarum.
Anuthaapam

9. Vellivuniranyoreeshonin‍vellivaal‍ kaanunnu
Velliveeyadiyaarakhilaadhaaramathaam - vellivum nee
/tkaantyaa nyangalle nee - thaathan
/tkathire! Shobhippi-kke-nnum.

10. Vellivin‍thattil‍ vasikkum punyanidhe! - parishuddha!
Vendaakkashdatha veen‍chintayumadiyaa-reennozhikka
/tsal‍kriyakall‍kku manhshu-ddhyaa
/tsamgathi varane nya-ngallkk.

11. Haabelin‍ kunyaadum nohinude-kaazhchayathum
Abrahaamthan‍ baliyum kaikkonda-kar‍tthaave,
/tnompum praar‍ththhanayum-kai-kko-
/tndan‍paaladiyaare-kaa-kkuka.

12. Mochanamathinaayu paapikalle! Varuvin‍-yaachippin‍
Muttunnor‍kku thurannidume naathhan‍-than vaathil
/tyaachikkunnon‍ praa-pikkum
/tanveshippon‍ kaikkollllum.
Parethar‍

13. Kar‍tthaave! Nin‍rakthashareerangall‍-kaikkond
Bhaktharathaayi marichor‍kkarullaname-nallor‍mma
/tninte mahathvamudi-kkum-naall‍
/tnil‍kkanamavar‍ valabhaa-ga-tthil.
(suriyaaniyil)

Bedu mor dukharono thobo laneede mhaimane
Dekhaal phagaroku kaadeesho veshthee dmokku haayo
/tvankumun men yaameenoku
/tbyaumo ddanho raabooso

items.content:
1. Praathhkaalatthil-dhoopam vaykkumpoll
Doothanmaar vaanil-sthothram paadunnu.
Paapam poondorkkaay-mochippin dhoopam
Pattakkaareesha-arppicheedunnu.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
Naathhaa yaachippin-saaphalyam nalka.

2. Kaalatthe aharon-kartthrpreethikkaayu
Dhoopatthodaarnnaan-samshuddhasthhaanam
Saurabhyam kaikkondeeshan modichu
Dvesham poondore-kaatthaan nirbbaadham.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa devaa!
Ninnanpaal-krodham neekkenam.

3. Oottungkal chenn-neerinnarththhichu
Shramaayasthreeye-veendone sthothram!
Neerangarththhichu-sthree thannillethum
Divyam paaneeyam-nee daanam cheythu
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
nin raktham moolam-lokam nee veendu.

4. Nin perkkarppicho-ree dhoopam shuddham
Aharonrethoppam-nin preethikkaaka
Dvesham poondaarthan-naasham theertthone
Thval kaarunyatthaal-krodham neekkenam.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
Devaagaare nin shaino vaazhatte.
Daivamaathaav

4. Nin perkkarppicho-ree dhoopam shuddham
Aharonrethoppam-nin preethikkaaka
Dvesham poondaarthan-naasham theertthone
Thval kaarunyatthaal-krodham neekkenam.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
Devaagaare nin shaino vaazhatte.

5. Dhanye! Maathaave-ninnodullllanpaal
Paapatthin bhaaram-naathhan neekkatte
Nyaayattheerppingkal-paayikkaathamme
Praarththhikkenam nee-nin puthran mumpil.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
Nin yaachippennum-nyangallkkaalambam.

6. Seenaayu shailatthil-mooshaa darshicha
Mullkkoottam kanye!-nin chithram thanne
Maathaave! Mullllaay-kandaan nin deham
Thee theendaanyora-ppathram kanyaathvam.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
Antarbhaagaagni-garbhasthhan Daivam.

7. Kanyaamegham bhoo-lokeshan thanne
Evvannam poonde-nnennodothaname
Maalaakhaamumpan-grabreeyel chonnaan
Lokeshan naathhan-vaazhvoo ninnullllil
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa thaan
Thanne sathyam - vishvatthe veendon.

8 vaazhvinnaakatte-maathaavinnormma
Maaddhyasthham nammall-kkennaallum kotta
Thannil ninnallo-shleehanmaar naathhan
Lokam rakshippaan-samjaatham cheythu.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
Thaanthanne sathyam-vishvatthe veendaan.
Parishuddhanmaar

9. Thannullllam kaiyil-pallllikkullllil nal
peedham nirmmichon-mashihaaye, sthothram.
Nibiyar shleehanmaar-sahader siddhanmaar
Ennee nikshepam-sookshichaanullllil.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
Ee divyaagaaram- sthhaapichon dhanyan.

10. Kaattil paarunnor-aaraanennevam
Veeranmaarekka-ndeshaayaa chonnu
Sammaanaarhanmaar-sahadenmaar siddhar
Shleehar nibiyanmaa-rathre salsamgham.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
Bhooshaadaathaave! - kaarunyam cheyka.

11. Ennodothenam-sahadenmaare! Kell
Entortthikkashdappaadellaamettu
Aa bhaagyam nethram-darshichittilla,
Kettittille, kaa-thullllaarnnittilla.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
Bhakthanmaarkkeeshan-nalkeedum sthhaanam.

12. Saurabhyam pole theekkundil pettu
Snehatthin gandham-vyaapippichore!
Ningallthannasthhi-maanichittulllla
Pallllikkull kshemam-varddhippaanaayi
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
Kartthaavin pakkal-praarththhicheedenam.
Ekaparishuddhan

13. (maartthommaa) shleehaa! Ninne ormmicho-
Raattinkoottatthe kartthan kaakkunnu
Kandaalum ninne kondaadum koottam
Ninne nandikkum - mashihaaye vaazhtthum
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
Nin yaachippennum sangkethasthhaanam.

14. (maartthommaa) siddhaa!-aartthanmaarellaam
thvalpaadam pooki-thadvaakyam kellkka
Saatthaanaakarshi-chennorkkaashvaa
Sam rogikkaalambam-nalkenam naathhaa
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
Nin yaachippennum sangkethasthhaanam.
Prabhaatham

15. Vettam veenappoll daaveedaamodaal
Devaagaaratthil praarththhippaan poyi
Lokam veendone!- naathhaa en vaakyam
Dhyaanam kanneere-nniva kaikkollllane.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
Nee nalkeedenam paapatthin shaanti.

16.Kshipram maayunno-ree mayyalkkaalam
Vishvatthe evam-shobhippichengkil
Paathaallasthhanmaar-uththhaanam cheyke
Kartthaavitthum-naallettam shreshdham
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
Bhooshaadaathaave! Kaarunyam cheyka.
Anuthaapam

17. Paapam cheyyaayvin-vaathukkal neethi
Peredum peri-kaaval nilkkunnu
Than kaippenaayaal-cherkkumgranthhatthil
Martthyanmaar krthyam- haa! Nirddaakshinyam!
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
Sarvvaantavedee-kaarunyam cheyka.

18. Thannatthaan paapam-cheythen kezhunnen
Tholppichaan saatthaan nyaan kuttakkaaran
Kashdam nyaan doshi- haa kashdam dhrshdan
Nyaayattheerppin naa-llayyayyo! Kashdam.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
Kartthaave! Annaall-kaarunyam cheyka.

19. Kartthaave! Nyangall-vaathil muttunnu
Neeyallo nalku-nnellaamellaarkkum
Chodichaal kittum-thedumpoll kaanum
muttumpoll vaathil-bandham neengunnu.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
Vaathil kezhunnor-kkekunnon dhanyan.

20. Daivatthin vaathil-kaarunyaasthhaanam
Muttikkezhumpoll-aashvaasam nalkum
Dushdasthree choran- chungkakkaaran than
Kanneer vaartthappoll-paapam maayichu.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa naathhaa!
Nyangallkkum-nalkenam-mukthi.
Parethar
21. Vishvaasatthaale-vaangippoyore
Praarththhicheedumpoll-orttheedenam naam
Aashvaasam nithyam-praapicheedaanaayu
Thronossinmel pe-rorttheedenam naam.
/thaaleluyyaa-u haaleluyyaa
Jeevippikkunnon-naathhaa! Sthothram the!
